title: Marina Sequin Top
description:
Designed in a Crisp Cotton Shirting, the Marina Sequin Shirt is our take on a classic button-up shirt with a twist. 

Featuring artfully placed sequin flowers and blouson sleeves offset by the straight-cut of the shirt, Marina has a feminine look and feel, with a nod to classic men’s shirting.

Style the Marina Sequin Shirt back to the Suede Hudson Skirt for a polished day-to-night look.

Product Details:
• Collared
• Long elasticated sleeve
• Unlined
• Cotton shirting
• Sequin flower details
• Button up

Fit Details:
• True to size
• Klara is 5'9" and wears a size S
